#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
 long long counter,t,n,r,ans;
 scanf("%lld",&t);
 while(t--)
 {
  ans=1;
  scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&r);
  r=min(r,n-r);
  counter=1;
  while(counter<=r)
  {
   ans=ans*(n-counter+1)/counter;
   counter++;
  }
  printf("%lld\n",ans);
 }
 return 0;
}
